titles.title: Women's Health and Cancer Rights Conforming Amendments of 2007
Women's Health and Cancer Rights Conforming Amendments of 2007

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to require group health plans to provide coverage for reconstructive surgery following mastectomy, consistent with the Women's Health and Cancer Rights Act of 1998.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Civil Rights and Liberties, Minority Issues
